items.sentence: Tom spent the remainder of the night thinking about Mary.
Tom spoke to Mary in French, but she answered in English.
Tom spoke to the person sitting next to him on the train.
Tom started to unfold the piece of paper Mary handed him.
Tom strung up a hammock between two trees and took a nap.
Tom suggested to Mary that she apologize and make amends.
I could probably get used to having Tom for a son-in-law.
I thought I told you not to buy anything from that store.
I wish I could figure out how to convince Tom to help us.
I didn\'t realize that Tom had never gone to high school.
